Question.Subject: Why does Formspring.me suck so bad?
Question.Content: EVERY time I go on there, there is always something wrong! The search doesn't work, I can't log in, questions won't show up, I can't ask questions, ect. The person who made this website really has to work on it and check up on it, cause it's really annoying! Don't you think?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I know it freakin sucks I cant search ppl! it says theres an error proccessing. These ppl need to get their crap together for this website

Answer.Content: I know it freakin sucks I cant search ppl! it says theres an error proccessing. These ppl need to get their crap together for this website
